geffen_in,77,167,5	script	Weapons#Gef01	47,{
if(faction != $geffaction) {
	mes "[Weapons]";
	mes "Leave...";
	close;
	}
callshop "Weapons#gef",0;
}

-	shop	Weapons#gef	47,1750:-1,1751:-1,1101:-1,1701:-1,1201:-1,1204:-1,1207:-1,1210:-1,1213:-1,1216:-1,1601:-1,1604:-1,1607:-1,1610:-1,1146:-1,1245:-1
